data.event: The county was organized in 1851 from parts of Haywood and Macon counties.

event.title: moved to Webster the following year

data.event: The original county courts were held at the Dan Bryson home in the community of Beta in Scott Creek township, and moved to Webster the following year.

event.title: 1861 parts of Jackson and Henderson counties were combined

data.event: In 1861 parts of Jackson and Henderson counties were combined to form Transylvania County.

event.title: 1871 parts of Jackson and Macon counties were combined

data.event: In 1871 parts of Jackson and Macon counties were combined to form Swain County.
In 1913 Sylva became the county seat.
